sentence: Around  240  hostages  were  taken  and  about  1,200  people  killed  in  the  attack,  Israel  says.
Around  240  captives  were  seized  by  Hamas  in  last  month's  attack  on  Israel  and  about  1,200  people  killed.

In  seven  weeks  of  Israeli  airstrikes  and  ground  assaults  in  Gaza,  more  than  13,300  Palestinians  have  been  killed,  mostly  women  and  youth,  according  to  Palestinian  health  officials.
